member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebReportWizard.Config(Aptify.Framework.Application.AptifyApplication,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This overload passes in the report wizard key value, which is an encrypted string that can be generated by calling the CreateReportWizardKey Static/Shared method on this class. The idea behind this is to allow this key to be passed on the URL without tampering being possible. An encrypted key value is automatically generated. In addition, this method reduces the amount of space used on the GET URL when invoking the Report Wizard or Report Viewer since the details of the parameters are stored on the server rather than being passed around via the GET URL.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebReportWizard.ReportWizardKey
member.summary: Returns the report wizard key value that is used to pass unique credential information from the Report Wizard control to the Report Viewer Control.

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebReportWizard.GenerateClientReportScript
member.summary: This method is responsible for creating a client script function that calls the base _ReportWizardOpenReport() function in the standard Aptify Report Wizard JavaScript library
